***Obsolete**: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.*

| Type | Miscellaneous item                                                                                                            |
| :--- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Name | Piece from Xom's chessboard                                                                                                   |
| Icon | [![Piece from xom's chessboard.png](/images/f/f7/Piece_from_xom%27s_chessboard.png)](/File:Piece_from_xom%27s_chessboard.png) |

|   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| - | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A shimmering multi-coloured chesspiece belonging to Xom, god of chaos. When moved a glimmer of chaos from some cosmic game is imposed upon the battlefield. This glimmer afflicts a random foe with one of the following: haste, invisibility, might, corona, slow, paralyse, confuse, malmutate, petrify, or sleep. |

Evoking a **piece from Xom's chessboard**, in the spirit of [Xom](/Xom "Xom"), allows you to cause a random effect[\[1\]](#cite_note-1) on a random monster within LOS. You must beat the enemy's [willpower](/Willpower "Willpower") in order for it to work. Your [Evocations](/Evocations "Evocations") skill will increase the duration of the effect - positive or negative, as well as the chance to defeat the enemy's willpower.

Even though it favors negative effects, you should always stay careful by being far away and having an escape plan.

| Effect                                       | Probability |
| -------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| [Haste](/Haste "Haste")                      | 5%          |
| [Invisibility](/Invisibility "Invisibility") | 5%          |
| [Might](/Might "Might")                      | 5%          |
| [Corona](/Corona "Corona")                   | 10%         |
| [Slow](/Slow "Slow")                         | 15%         |
| [Malmutate](/Malmutate "Malmutate")          | 15%         |
| [Petrify](/Petrify "Petrify")                | 15%         |
| [Paralyze](/Paralyze "Paralyze")             | 10%         |
| [Confuse](/Confuse "Confuse")                | 10%         |
| [Sleep](/Sleep "Sleep")                      | 10%         |

The chesspiece has 15 charges, and will recharge only when you gain [experience](/Experience "Experience"). Carrying multiples is no more useful than carrying one, since charges are shared between all pieces.

[Cheibriados](/Cheibriados "Cheibriados") dislikes this item, as it may cause [haste](/Haste "Haste"). You'll only lose piety if you actually get the haste effect. [Zin](/Zin "Zin") dislikes any of the random effects.

| -------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [![Xom's king.png](/images/c/c0/Xom%27s_king.png)](/File:Xom%27s_king.png) | [![Xom's queen.png](/images/3/3f/Xom%27s_queen.png)](/File:Xom%27s_queen.png) | [![Xom's knight.png](/images/5/5b/Xom%27s_knight.png)](/File:Xom%27s_knight.png) | [![Xom's bishop.png](/images/5/59/Xom%27s_bishop.png)](/File:Xom%27s_bishop.png) | [![Piece from xom's chessboard.png](/images/f/f7/Piece_from_xom%27s_chessboard.png)](/File:Piece_from_xom%27s_chessboard.png) | [![Xom's pawn.png](/images/6/62/Xom%27s_pawn.png)](/File:Xom%27s_pawn.png) | [![Xom's thimble.png](/images/d/da/Xom%27s_thimble.png)](/File:Xom%27s_thimble.png) |

## History

- Pieces from Xom's chessboard were removed in [0.31](/0.31 "0.31").
- Pieces from Xom's chessboard were reintroduced in [0.27](/0.27 "0.27"), replacing the [wand of random effects](/Wand_of_random_effects "Wand of random effects"). Compared to the wand, the chesspiece can not produce any directly damaging effects. It also has a random target.
- Pieces from Xom's chessboard were considered for inclusion in [0.18](/0.18 "0.18"), with a completely different effect. They would have you swap places with monsters, which had a chance to [confuse](/Confusion "Confusion") them. It could backfire and instead cause a random bad [Xom](/Xom "Xom") action.

## References

1. [↑](#cite_ref-1) [evoke.cc:883](https://github.com/crawl/crawl/blob/0.30.1/crawl-ref/source/evoke.cc#L883) (0.30.1)

Type Miscellaneous item
Name Piece from Xom's chessboard
Icon
A shimmering multi-coloured chesspiece belonging to Xom, god of chaos. When moved a glimmer of chaos from some cosmic game is imposed upon the battlefield. This glimmer afflicts a random foe with one of the following: haste, invisibility, might, corona, slow, paralyse, confuse, malmutate, petrify, or sleep.

Evoking a piece from Xom's chessboard, in the spirit of Xom, allows you to cause a random effect[1] on a random monster within LOS. You must beat the enemy's willpower in order for it to work. Your Evocations skill will increase the duration of the effect - positive or negative, as well as the chance to defeat the enemy's willpower.

Even though it favors negative effects, you should always stay careful by being far away and having an escape plan.

Effect Probability
Haste 5%
Invisibility 5%
Might 5%
Corona 10%
Slow 15%
Malmutate 15%
Petrify 15%
Paralyze 10%
Confuse 10%
Sleep 10%

The chesspiece has 15 charges, and will recharge only when you gain experience. Carrying multiples is no more useful than carrying one, since charges are shared between all pieces.

Cheibriados dislikes this item, as it may cause haste. You'll only lose piety if you actually get the haste effect. Zin dislikes any of the random effects.

History

  • Pieces from Xom's chessboard were removed in 0.31.
  • Pieces from Xom's chessboard were reintroduced in 0.27, replacing the wand of random effects. Compared to the wand, the chesspiece can not produce any directly damaging effects. It also has a random target.
  • Pieces from Xom's chessboard were considered for inclusion in 0.18, with a completely different effect. They would have you swap places with monsters, which had a chance to confuse them. It could backfire and instead cause a random bad Xom action.
